p: In addition to the alignments to the nuclear genome, the DNA sequence reads were compared to the organelle chloroplast (NC_025545.1) and mitochondria (NC_027722.1) genomes of B. braunii as they are available in the NCBI reference database. The increased copy number per cell of these organelle genomes may result in a greater proportion of positive alignments. There were 18 reads from BL 0 that aligned to the mitochondrion genome and 5 reads which aligned to the chloroplast genome. There were no reads which aligned to either organelle for samples BL 35 and BL 125 or any of the controls (TableÂ 1).
